query:
SELECT
                v.id,
                v.book_id,
                v.chapter,
                v.verse,
                v.text,
                b.name_ru as book_name
            FROM bible_word_index w
            JOIN bible_verses v ON v.id = w.verse_id
            JOIN bible_books b ON b.id = v.book_id
            WHERE w.word = lower($1)
            ORDER BY v.book_id, v.chapter, v.verse
            LIMIT $2
